verbs.description: [ARG0: Rudy] Giuliani 's conduct since [V: joining] [ARG1: President Donald Trump 's legal team] has been the subject of several private conversations among White House aides . The concern : whether his erratic behavior is causing more problems for a president who already had a pile of legal and political problems .
